title: Memoir Tells Of Daring Medevac Rescue In Afghanistan's Valley Of Death
teaser: Renee Montagne talks to helicopter pilot Erik Sabiston and medic Julia Bringloe, former medevac crewmembers, about a nerve-racking rescue mission they did in Afghanistan's Valley of Death in 2011.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
